thread.title: Gilda Radner Documentary to Open Tribeca Film Festival

author: Charles Passy
title: Gilda Radner Documentary to Open Tribeca Film Festival
text:
Nearly 30 years after her death, Gilda Radner will be in the spotlight once again.
“Love, Gilda,” a documentary about the comedian of “Saturday Night Live” fame, will open the Tribeca Film Festival’s 2018 edition April 18 at the Beacon Theatre, festival officials said Tuesday.
The full lineup for the festival, which runs April 18-29 at venues... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
